pr_title: vnext regen resources, fix api-version method parameter

timeline.bodyText: Should we apply this change to all existing files in different modules?
timeline.author: xseeseesee

replies.bodyText:
We can get some script to do this. Maybe later when someone finished more important tasks...
Currently newly generated code will use this short style.

timeline.bodyText: is this change caused by generator change also?
timeline.author: yungezz

replies.bodyText: Yes. I think it is from changes by modelerfour. Not confirmed.
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

timeline.bodyText: just confirm, this is change from generator
timeline.author: yungezz

replies.bodyText:
Actually this is Impl change.
The resources RP is among the 1st to migrate. Hence there remains quite some TODO/FIXME.
The method call is actually same, but older generator does not generate the method with default parameters (hence the 2 nulls need to be written explicitly in code before).
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

timeline.message: regen resources with fix on docstring
